name: Crystal Missile
description:
Thee WIZZARD casts thy CRYSTAL MISSILE, enemies sizzle!

Cast thee unto thy TOWER OF MADNESS, for one or two! Tumble and tear through pesky visitors and seek out and DESTROY the bottom-feeder's CASTLE KEEP!

Controls: Keyboard or Controller

  • Space / Controller Button 3 (Xbox Y) - Jump
  • Arrows / Analog Stick - Move
  • r - restart || Alt +F4 - quit

Player 2 is activated when two controllers are plugged in.

TOJAM 2020 - May 8-10th, 2020 (48hrs)

SFX: Zsolt Szanati
Music: Aryo Nazaradeh
Fonts: Andrew Colenbrander

Everything Else: 
Tyson Moll / VultureBoy

Minor adjustments and alternate platforms (inc. android) coming soon.
